audioText: Le prêtre britannique se demande s'il mariera ce couple avant que la femme enceinte n'accouche, malgré les objections vaines de sa belle-famille conservatrice qui considère cette union prématurée.
question: What is the British priest wondering about?
options: Whether he will marry the couple before the pregnant woman gives birth, despite vain objections from conservative in-laws
Whether the conservative family will eventually accept the marriage proposal
Whether the ceremony should be postponed until after the baby is born
Whether the couple should have a traditional or modern wedding ceremony
explanation: The text states 'Le prêtre britannique se demande s'il mariera ce couple avant que la femme enceinte n'accouche, malgré les objections vaines de sa belle-famille conservatrice' - The British priest wonders if he will marry this couple before the pregnant woman gives birth, despite the vain objections of her conservative in-laws. 'Mariera' is the future tense of 'marier'.
